SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class State

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.State
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnUpdateNeededListener, Serializable
public class State extends Object implements Serializable, OnUpdateNeededListener
State is a class that contains all the references necessary to modify and update the 'state' (hence the name of the class) of the game.
Since:
22/04/2023

Version:
3.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
See Also:
  • PersonalGoal
  • CommonGoal
  • Board
  • Player

    checkAdjacentTiles(Player player)
    Method that checks if the given Player has groups of adjacent item tiles of the same type on his bookshelf and, if so, will assign the points to the player.

    Method that checks if the given Player has achieved the first e/o second CommonGoal and, if so, will assign the points to the player.

    Method that checks if the given Player has achieved his PersonalGoal and, if so, will assign the points to the player.

    Finds a single group of adjacent tiles with the same TileType starting from a given position in the bookshelf.

    • checkCommonGoal

      public void checkCommonGoal(Player player)
      Method that checks if the given Player has achieved the first e/o second CommonGoal and, if so, will assign the points to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player whose BookShelf is being tested in case of achievement of one or both common goals.

    • checkPersonalGoal

      public void checkPersonalGoal(Player player)
      Method that checks if the given Player has achieved his PersonalGoal and, if so, will assign the points to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player whose BookShelf is being tested in case of achievement of his personal goal.

    • checkAdjacentTiles

      public void checkAdjacentTiles(Player player)
      Method that checks if the given Player has groups of adjacent item tiles of the same type on his bookshelf and, if so, will assign the points to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player whose BookShelf is being tested in case of groups of adjacent item tiles of the same type.

    • adjacentGroupsScore

      private int adjacentGroupsScore(int size)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the points granted depending on how many tiles are connected

    • onUpdateNeededListener

      public void onUpdateNeededListener(Player player)
      Called when an update is needed for the specified player. This method is invoked when an update is needed for a specific player. It notifies the registered listeners about various updates, including:
      • Players list change
      • Game state change
      • Current player change
      • Last player update
      • Assigned common goals
      • Changed common goal available score
      • Message sent
      Specified by:
      onUpdateNeededListener in interface OnUpdateNeededListener
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom the update is needed
      See Also:
      • Player

    • findGroups

      public static Set<Set<EntryPatternGoal>> findGroups(TileType[][] bookShelf)
      Finds groups of adjacent tiles with the same TileType in a given bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      bookShelf - The bookshelf represented as a matrix of TileType values
      Returns:
      A set of sets, where each inner set represents a group of adjacent tiles with the same TileType
      See Also:
      • EntryPatternGoal
      • TileType

    • findSingleGroup

      private static Optional<Set<EntryPatternGoal>> findSingleGroup(int i, int j, TileType[][] bookShelf, boolean[][] alreadyTaken, TileType tileType)
      Finds a single group of adjacent tiles with the same TileType starting from a given position in the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      i - The row index of the starting position
      j - The column index of the starting position
      bookShelf - The bookshelf represented as a matrix of TileType values
      alreadyTaken - A boolean matrix indicating whether each tile has already been included in a group
      tileType - The TileType to search for in the group
      See Also:
      • TileType
      • EntryPatternGoal
